snippet: In an unusual step, federal officials also warned agencies and companies of possible cyberattacks if the American military takes action against Syria.
abstract: Federal Bureau of Investigations increases surveillance of Syrians inside United States; move is in response to concerns that military strike against government of Pres Bashar al-Assad could lead to terrorist attacks here or against American allies and interests abroad.
lead_paragraph: In an unusual step, federal officials also warned agencies and companies of possible cyberattacks if the American military takes action against Syria.

headline.main: F.B.I. Sharpens Scrutiny of Syrians in U.S.
headline.print_headline: F.B.I. Sharpens Scrutiny of Syrians in U.S.
